bayes

Class TensorToArray

  • java.lang.Object
    • bayes.TensorToArray
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Counts, Estimates

    public abstract class TensorToArray
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class that cannot be instantiated that provides two methods for dealing with tensor data.
    Author:
    Nuno Mendes, Sofia Silva, Tiago Ricardo

        public int getGlobal(int[] localcfg)
        Receives an array of values and generates a mapping to a linear index.

      • getLocal

        public static int[] getLocal(int global,
                             java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> js)
        Static method that receives a linear index and a list of the number of different values an index can have.
        Parameters:
        global - Integer mapped index.
        js - list of total possible values for each index.
        Returns:
        mapping from linear index to a combination of values.
